```{r echo=FALSE}
tab_df<- df %>% group_by(SOURCE, ELIG) %>% tally() %>%
  rename(NUM_PEOPLE = n)

# custom table to control the header and footer html tags
sketch = htmltools::withTags(
  table(
    thead(
      tr(
      th("Advertisement Method"),
      th(paste("Eligibility Following Assessment (Y/N)"), sup(1)),
      th("Number of People"),
      )
    ),
    tbody(),
    tfoot(
      tr(
        th(colspan = 3, span(style = "font-size: 10;
                                      font-weight: normal",
          sup(1), "Assessment consisted of SCID-5 and SIDP-5 for Research")),
      )
    )
  )
)

#render the table
datatable(tab_df,
          caption = htmltools::tags$caption(
            style = '
                    caption-side: top;
                    text-align: center;
                    font-weight: bold;',
              'Table 1: Number of People (By Advertisement Source) Who Were Eligible for NeuroMAP'),
      container = sketch,
          options = list(dom = "tip"),
          rownames = FALSE)

```
